verbs.description: In an [V: escalating] [ARG1: spat] over the United States ' trade deficit with most of its major trading partners , including China , U.S. President Donald Trump said last week he was pushing ahead with hefty tariffs on $ 50 billion of Chinese imports , starting on July 6 .

In an [ARGM-ADJ: escalating] [V: spat] [ARG2: over the United States ' trade deficit with most of its major trading partners , including China] , U.S. President Donald Trump said last week he was pushing ahead with hefty tariffs on $ 50 billion of Chinese imports , starting on July 6 .
